news.title: Anna Jones’s recipes for two salads made with new season asparagus | The modern cook
news.summary: The arrival of British asparagus marks a change in the year for me. Those first bunches turn up at the greengrocer when the parks and meadows are full and fragrant, green and scented.

news.title: Anna Jones’s recipe for mix-and-match pizzas with unusual bases | The modern cook
news.summary: As I write this, I’m in the clouds, somewhere high up between London and Italy.

news.title: Anna Jones recipe for baked new jersey potatoes and four complementary sauces | The modern cook
news.summary: The first new potatoes for me are as much a sign that summer is around the corner as strawberries or asparagus are.

news.title: Anna Jones’s recipes for arroz de tomate and sweet potato cakes | The modern cook
news.summary: Every August, we spend a couple of weeks on the wild south-west coast of Portugal.

news.title: Anna Jones’s recipe for plum, lime and peanut salad | The modern cook
news.summary: Summer wanes and autumn shows its face. This year, I am less ready for the change of season than ever before, but the show of plums has softened the blow a little.

news.title: Anna Jones’s recipe for late summer sweetcorn and tomato curry | The modern cook
news.summary: My summer was far too short and I’m not ready to let go just yet. I’m wishing with everything I have for another few weeks of sunshine, dinners outside, feet on grass, iced coffees.

news.title: Anna Jones’s recipes from A Modern Cook’s Year | Book extract
news.summary: My new book is written in six chapters, each of which roughly knits together two months at a time – I find a year divided into four seasons a bit too vague.

news.title: Recipes from The Modern Cook’s Year | Book extract
news.summary: The techniques I lean on in the kitchen change as the year unfolds. In the autumn, my oven is in constant use: I start roasting again, big trays of jewel-coloured roots, the last of the corn, broccoli and cauliflowers.
